summary: This is a replacer for the Nord Plate Armor for Skyrim. It is basically fully compatible for every vanilla Nord Plate textures.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4][b]Nordplate Armor Replacer

[/b][/size][/font][size=2][font=Arial]I proudly announce to you my new replacer for the Nord Plate armor for Skyrim. 
[/font]I took hours of working, to reach this goal.

This armor is in fact compatible with any Nord Plate retexture (even CaBal120's textures or SPOA Silver Knight Armor)

Its for male and female characters vanillia, currently no beast races supported

[u]Future Plans:[/u]
 - new Helmet

Q & A:

Q: The texture for the cuirass doesn't look like the rest of the armor. What can i do?
A: You have to edit the texture by yourself, since i am not allowed to upload any compability patches for other texture replacers for the Nord Plate Armor.
In the RAR-File is an example and instructions what you have to adapt to use it with retextures.

Endorse, if you like this mod and feel free to ask if something isnt`t right or for suggestions to improve it.[/size]
author: kurtie
